google-drive.description: Google Drive API tools for accessing Drive files, documents, and spreadsheets

tools.name: list_drive_folder
tools.description: List all files and folders in a Google Drive folder

tools.name: get_drive_file_info
tools.description: Get metadata for a Google Drive file

tools.name: download_drive_file
tools.description: Download a file from Google Drive

parameters.output_path: string (optional) - Local path to save the file

tools.name: export_google_doc
tools.description: Export a Google Doc to specified format (docx, pdf, txt, html, rtf)

parameters.output_path: string (required) - Local path to save the exported file
parameters.format: string (optional) - Export format: docx, pdf, txt, html, rtf (default: docx)

tools.name: export_google_sheet
tools.description: Export a Google Sheet to specified format (xlsx, csv, pdf, ods, tsv)

parameters.output_path: string (required) - Local path to save the exported file
parameters.format: string (optional) - Export format: xlsx, csv, pdf, ods, tsv (default: xlsx)

tools.name: download_drive_folder
tools.description: Download all files from a Google Drive folder recursively

parameters.output_dir: string (optional) - Local directory to save files (default: data/drive_downloads)

tools.name: search_drive_files
tools.description: Search for files in Google Drive by name or query

parameters.query: string (required) - Search query (file name or Drive search syntax)
parameters.folder_id: string (optional) - Limit search to specific folder
